attributes.action: Child benefits should only be used to buy products essential for living
attributes.additional_details: People who claim child benefits should only be allowed to spend that money on products that are essential to living not improving living. These products are needs not wants, so if they use these benefits to buy sky that is a need not a need and it should be illegal to use the taxpayers money to buy things that aren't needed to survive, and have a basic standard of living.
